preqs: Students must have passed ECC1000, ECF1100, ECP1100 or ECB1101 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECB1101, ECC1000, ECF1100, ECP1100} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

unitName: Contemporary economic policy and general equilibrium
description: The unit will examine a variety of major economic policy issues within the general equilibrium framework. The issues will be of major importance for many countries, such as: carbon emissions abatement, free-trade agreements, direct and indirect taxation reforms, industrial relations, domestic and international immigration, macroeconomic stimulus, infrastructure and other major project evaluation, and catastrophic events such as terrorist attacks and global pandemics.
